import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faHeartBroken, faHeart } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; const PostItem = props => { const { postId, title, content, author, likes, dislikes, userlikes, userDislikes } = props return (
{title} {content}
-1 ? 'red' : 'gray'}/> {likes} -1 ? 'red' : 'gray'}/> {dislikes}
{author}
) } export default PostItem
